entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
